sourcesContent:
import { Component, ElementRef } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-header", templateUrl: "./header.component.html", styleUrls: ["./header.component.scss"], }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private el: ElementRef) {} scrollToSection(targetSectionId: string) { const targetEl = this.el.nativeElement.ownerDocument.getElementById(targetSectionId); if (targetEl) { targetEl.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } } }
